page.title: 10Leisure and Recreation (2)
page.content: The River Medway runs through our town.It is used by many people for fishing,boating and canoeing but some people think it should be used more extensivly. Next to the river is the park,apart from sports,the park has play areas for children,gardens for people to enjoy.In the park The Castle,a Norman ruin,is worth visiting.There is a small museum inside the castle which runs a small guided tour. In Tonbridge there are many clubs and societies. For the younger generation clubs such as Cubs,Scouts,Brownies and Guides.For the older people there are clubs which cater for gardening and day centres etc.
